title: Understanding Table Formatting
text: Formatting a range as a table in Excel offers several benefits, such as easier data management and enhanced visual appeal. It also enables features like sorting and filtering.

title: Automatic Table Creation
text: When you apply a table style to a range in Excel, it automatically converts the range into a table. This feature helps in organizing and managing data efficiently.

hintAnswer: Excel automatically creates the table when applying a table style to a range
title: Benefits of Table Styles
text: What happens when you apply a table style to a range in Excel?
choices: Excel automatically creates the table when applying a table style to a range
